snippet: A cigarette discarded in a stuffed chair touched off a fire that killed four people at a New Jersey shore motel last week, authorities said Monday....

headline.print_headline: Prosecutor: Smoking Caused NJ Fire That Killed 4
headline.main: Prosecutor: Smoking Caused NJ Fire That Killed 4

lead_paragraph: A cigarette discarded in a stuffed chair touched off a fire that killed four people at a New Jersey shore motel last week, authorities said Monday.
